name: Single Artist Metadata & Play Count Based Playlist
model_instructions: Create a playlist of 25 tracks by the target artist. The primary decision factor MUST be the 'local_library_likes' score, followed by 'play_count'. Ensure strong diversity across albums and release years to avoid monotony.

processing_steps.title: Super Hits & User Favorites (Top Priority)
processing_steps.description: Select the highest-rated and most-played tracks to form the core of the playlist.

processing_steps.title: Catalogue Fillers (Mid Priority)
processing_steps.description: Select popular tracks that may not be 'liked' but have high play counts, diversifying across the entire catalogue.

processing_steps.title: Essential Album Tracks (Diversity/Lowest Priority)
processing_steps.description: Fill the remainder with a mix of tracks from different, older albums to ensure the breadth of their career is covered.
